entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
